about: Florence, the cradle of the Renaissance, is home to world-class art, stunning architecture, and delicious Tuscan cuisine.

packages.name: Renaissance Florence Tour
packages.description: Discover the best of Florence's art and architecture.

packages.name: Tuscan Wine Tasting
packages.description: A day trip to the vineyards of Tuscany, including wine tastings.

packages.name: Florence Art & Culture
packages.description: An in-depth look at the museums and galleries of Florence.

packages.name: Cooking Class in Florence
packages.description: Learn to cook traditional Italian dishes with a local chef.

packages.name: Luxury Florence Experience
packages.description: Exclusive access to Florence's finest attractions.

packages.name: Florence Walking Tour
packages.description: Explore the city's landmarks on a guided walking tour.
